message: Hello Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $18,000. I believe it's a fantastic deal and will provide you with significant value.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value.
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my price reflects the true value of this product. I could meet you halfway at $15,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value.
